amendment.description: To require a report on the establishment of police and military forces in Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1315 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1315 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S9560-9562; text: CR S9567) To require a report on the establishment of police and military forces in Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1315 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Schumer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1315 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
